trans-unit.source: Hooray, you're here! The day just got better - enjoy the following tips!
A section of text like this is known as a text segment. Start rockin' your translations now!
Arriba, Arriba! Andale, Andale! Be fast as Speedy Gonzales. Just hit TAB to save and go to the next text segment, once you're done.

We just like to see you happy, that's why LingoChecks automatically check translations for predetermined criteria. Among other checks LingoHub verifies if "{0}" used in the original text are also present in translated texts.
